SoftSkills.heading: Soft Skills.
SoftSkills.subheading: Not everything it's about code, soft skills are important too.

s1.name: Problem Solving
s1.description: Ability to analyze issues and find effective solutions.

s2.name: Critical Thinking
s2.description: Capacity to evaluate information objectively to make informed decisions.

s3.name: Effective Communication
s3.description: Clearly conveying ideas and collaborating with others.

s4.name: Teamwork
s4.description: Working effectively with other team members to achieve common goals.

s5.name: Time Management
s5.description: Organizing and planning time efficiently to prioritize tasks and meet deadlines.

s6.name: Leadership
s6.description: Guiding and motivating teams to achieve goals and their best performance.

s7.name: Creativity
s7.description: Thinking outside the box to develop innovative ideas and/or solutions.

s8.name: Responsibility
s8.description: Demonstrating dedication and being reliable in all tasks.

s9.name: Punctuality
s9.description: Consistently being on time for meetings, deadlines, and commitments.

s10.name: Perseverance
s10.description: Staying determined and persistent in the face of challenges and setbacks. Maintaining effort and determination despite challenges and setbacks. Maintaining effort and persistence and staying determined and motivated despite challenges and setbacks.

s11.name: Professionalism
s11.description: Maintaining a high standard of conduct, appearance, and work quality and ethic in the workplace.

s12.name: Adaptability
s12.description: Adjusting to new changes, situations and environments with ease.

s13.name: Emotional Intelligence
s13.description: Understanding and managing your own emotions, as well as empathizing with others. Understanding and managing emotions for better interpersonal relationships.

s14.name: Conflict Resolution
s14.description: Effectively managing and resolving disagreements and finding mutually beneficial solutions. Effectively managing and resolving disagreements.

s15.name: Work Ethic
s15.description: Demonstrating dedication and reliability in all tasks.

s16.name: Empathy
s16.description: Ability to understand and share the feelings of others.

s17.name: Work Under Pressure
s17.description: Maintaining calm and efficiency in high-pressure situations and tight deadlines.

h1.name: Coding

h2.description: Capturing moments through the lens, exploring different styles and techniques to create compelling visual stories. Capturing moments and telling stories through the lens, experimenting with different styles and techniques to improve my craft.

h3.name: Traveling
h3.description: Exploring new cultures, cuisines, and landscapes to broaden my perspective of the world and gain new experiences.

h4.description: Diving into a variety of genres, from personal development to business growth, to expand my knowledge and imagination.

SocialProof.heading: Social Proof
SocialProof.subheading: Here are some testimonials from my colleagues and clients.

p1.name: Misael Delgado
p1.comment: His technical skills in data analysis, statistical modeling, and programming languages such as Python and SQL are truly commendable.

p2.name: John Doe
p2.comment: Working with Elvis has been a pleasure. He is a team player who communicates effectively and contributes valuable ideas. Elvis consistently delivers high-quality work on time. His problem-solving skills and attention to detail are exceptional. Elvis exceeded our expectations with his innovative approach and dedication to our project. Highly recommended!
